title: Permanently banned for swearing in a bot match (queued with 3)
body:
So what happened was I was queuing up with my friends IRMossimo and Ashellokookie in an intermediate bot match.
we went in and chose our lanes and played. we all decided to go mid for the lol's and then went off to our own lanes.

then this random guy started saying things like "i hate chinese because they're f***** autis***"
and then someone else started swearing in Spanish and Chinese so I swore in Spanish just as a joke.

I was in a voice call with my friends IRMossimo and Ashellokookie in discord
I had received 2 honours that game

I went to sleep because I had too and then this morning at 7:00 AM
I saw the ban message 
"You have been permanently banned"
Chat Logs : 
Game 1
SWORDMASTER52: who's top?
SWORDMASTER52: xddd
SWORDMASTER52: banjo, jem a pelle kys %%%got. (when i was joking around in french)
SWORDMASTER52: wow
SWORDMASTER52: offensive (when he said he hates chinese)
SWORDMASTER52: ?
SWORDMASTER52: mierda (when i was trying to swear in spanish)
SWORDMASTER52: however tf u spell it
SWORDMASTER52: GO CAIT (supporting caitlyn 1v2)
SWORDMASTER52: first time yasuo (lie)
SWORDMASTER52: gg lvl 5 (thought you could lvl up champs in bot games but im stupid)

Okay, Here's the big deal of mine that is pissing me off.
I know this might sound silly but I've spent more than 1000$ on this account and to see it disappear was devastating.
I'd save all my money from birthdays, Christmas and even jobs and some from parents. 
I didn't mean any offence to any players by swearing in spanish. I don't even know what half of them mean anyway.

I am sorry to riot and everyone who took offence but please unban my account. I've been playing this game for 5 years now. and I don't want all that money to go to waste. 

 - SWORDMASTER52

replies.body: One does simply not get perma banned for 1 game.... theres more to the story your not telling us
Well if you don't believe me then riot can come on and tell the "truth". I'm just stating what I got banned for and why I should be unbanned

"14 day ban"

so you had a 14 day ban and you still end up getting perma banned.

Well I've heard about chat bans, and I've never received one of those. the first ban I ever got was a couple months ago. 
I don't know :V

While it is not common, one can skip the chat ban punishments and get banned from one game if "incredibly toxic behavior" is detected. This behavior includes sexism, racism, **homophobia,** threats and **encouraging self harm/suicide**. 

> SWORDMASTER52: banjo, jem a pelle **kys %%%got**. (when i was joking around in french)

I was in a call with my two friends and I said that to them, I was using retarded french phrases at my school towards IRMossimo
I didn't say it towards anyone else in the team. Also, I was banned on the same account for exactly that reason (toxicity) but after the 14 day ban I tried stopping the flame. 

Like I said, calling someone a s*** isn't as bad is calling a whole race f**** autistic?
I mean c'mon I was sticking up to a friend and yeah it probably wasn't a good thing to do (saying s*** in a different language) but in a bot game aswell?

**If you were in call with them then why not just say it to them in voice chat? **

With that kind of language it doesn't matter who it was directed at or what kind of game it was in, all that matters is that you exposed someone who didn't want to see that kind of stuff in their games to it. Who were they to know that you were in a premade? Perhaps you hit a sore point for them, since this kind of toxicity is a trigger point for a lot of people and the type that the overwhelming majority of the community vote to punish at the highest level. 

Yes, what the other person was saying was inflammatory and would have also flagged their account for review and potential punishment (if you reported them). It doesn't matter what they say though, you are judged on your own actions.

I see where you're coming from, but my friend (Ashellokookie) is Chinese and I have a lot more Chinese friends and I'm not putting up with that. but the fact that I got banned for saying s*** in Spanish Is kind of stupid. and anyway there are a lot more people that user more vulgar language and still don't get banned.
Uh why are you posting this on boards xD ... just create a support ticket!!1
I already did just waiting for a response from riot themselves
So is the purpose of this boards to raise awareness ... or provide entertainment because its funny
Well I don't really find it funny because I've spent over 1000$ on this game and the fact that I'm sticking up for my friend and I get punished for it is bs.
Its called MUTE.. its there for a reason so its no ones fault but you for flaming
If you were in voice comm with your friends, why couldn't you just */mute all*? That way you wouldn't have witnessed any triggering toxicity to begin with.
now that I think about it that would be a good idea. but too late I guess :(
